entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this morning. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
